#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>

int main()

{
  int tst,n,p;
  char s[4];
  scanf("%d",&tst);
  while(tst--)
  {

    scanf("%d",&n);
    scanf("%s",s);
    scanf("%d",&p);

    if((strcmp(s,"odd"))==0)
        printf("%d\n",p*2);

   else
        printf("%d\n",p*2-1);



  }


    return 0;

}
